entry.source: {F812}Fierce-looking man\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,131001}Youse them, huh? The Samurai what{F801}handled Shibuya.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,131002}How do ya like this building, huh?{F801}Home of the rich and famous... An'{F801}all owned by the Ashura-kai.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fierce-looking man\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,131001}Youse them, huh? The Samurai what{F801}handled Shibuya.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,131002}How do ya like this building, huh?{F801}Home of the rich and famous... An'{F801}all owned by the Ashura-kai.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fierce-looking man\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,131003}Not impressed, are ya? Eh, fine.{F801}Take the elevator to the 52nd floor.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,131004}Mr. Tayama's waiting there with{F801}your friend.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Fierce-looking man\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,131003}Not impressed, are ya? Eh, fine.{F801}Take the elevator to the 52nd floor.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,131004}Mr. Tayama's waiting there with{F801}your friend.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} and his fellow Samurai{F801}entered the huge building...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Fierce-looking man\0{F87A,138}{F813,0,131005}Mr. Tayama said to me you're free to{F801}come and go.{F801}
